item.title: How to Install and use Ventoy
item.description: Ventoy is a program that allows a USB drive to function as an installer/live instance of multiple operating systems at once. Once set up, the USB is still able to store files like usual, but if selected as a boot drive, it will display a menu with all of the .iso files on the drive to choose from. What you'll need. USB drive (anything larger than 1 GB should work). Computer running Linux or Windows.
